description:
This video was kindly sponsored by War Thunder! It’s an incredibly comprehensive vehicle combat game that’s genuinely a lot of fun. If you download it for free with my link, you also get a huge bonus pack including vehicles, boosters, and more: https://playwt.link/soundsmith

War Thunder is a highly detailed vehicle combat game containing over 2000 playable tanks, aircraft, and ships spanning over 100 years of development. Immerse yourself completely in dynamic battles with an unparalleled combination of realism and approachability.

SURPRISE (again)! A Mann’s Guide to the Huntsman is real. It wasn’t a bait-and-switch, this is a double feature.

Some people think that gaming guides should teach the viewer how to use an item or a character in the most optimal, effective way possible. Some people think that guides have to be a serious, well-informed take on a technique or style of play. Some people are stupid. Why bother being optimal with a weapon when you can be a true Mann Co. Mercenary and run around using it like a bumbling idiot? It's way more fun if you do that.

Co-Created by Clockwerk Smurf: https://www.youtube.com/user/marinefighter9 

Animation/Thumbnails by:
Toten: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCUXaD2C5sgwXgio0C71qtTg
